doc:
Risë Stevens https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ris%C3%AB_Stevens 0 Risë Stevens (; June 11, 1913 – March 20, 2013) was an American operatic mezzo-soprano. Beginning in 1938, she sang for the Metropolitan Opera in New York City for more than two decades during the 1940s and 1950s. Risë_Stevens ( ; June_11_,_1913 – March_20_,_2013 ) was an_American_operatic_mezzo-soprano . Beginning in 1938 , she sang for the_Metropolitan_Opera in New_York_City for more_than_two_decades during the_1940s_and_1950s .
